text: Brahim Ben Daoud (born 7 May 1994) is a French professional footballer who plays as a forward for Istres, on loan from AC Arles-Avignon. ==Club career== Ben Daoud made his full debut in a 1–1 Ligue 2 draw against Châteauroux in September 2013. He was sent on loan to Istres in January 2015. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:French footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:French people of Algerian descent Category:Championnat National players Category:AC Arles-Avignon players Category:FC Istres players
title: Brahim Ben Daoud
